member.name: IDCompositionAffineTransform2DEffect.SetBorderMode
member.summary: Sets the border mode to use with the effect.
member.param: Specifies the border mode to use with the effect.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionAffineTransform2DEffect.SetInterpolationMode
member.summary: Sets the interpolation mode of the effect.
member.param: Specifies the interpolation mode of the effect.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionAffineTransform2DEffect.SetSharpness
member.summary: Sets the sharpness of the effect.
member.param: Specifies the sharpness of the effect.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionAffineTransform2DEffect.SetSharpness
member.summary: Sets the sharpness of the effect.
member.param: An animation that represents how the sharpness value changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionAffineTransform2DEffect.SetTransformMatrix
member.summary: Sets the transform matrix of the effect.
member.param: Specifies the transform matrix for the effect to use.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionAffineTransform2DEffect.SetTransformMatrixElement
member.summary: Sets an element of the transform matrix of the effect.
member.param: The new value of the element.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionAffineTransform2DEffect.SetTransformMatrixElement
member.summary: Sets an element of the transform matrix of the effect.
member.param: An animation that represents how the element value changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionAffineTransform2DEffect
member.summary: The arithmetic composite effect is used to combine 2 images using a weighted sum of pixels from the input images.
